title: PBE account lost
body:
My computer was broken and i had nothing to do, so i traveled to Australia for a while, this was like more then 2 years ago..
Then i came back to my country, changed my computer and kinda forgot about my Pbe account.
I just tried to login in but i cant remember both account name and password, how can i get them back? Because i cant find a way to :V

replies.body:
You can use [**this page**](https://login.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/?region=pbe&lang=en_BE&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Fboards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com%2Fen%2F) to reset your password and request your username with the links at the bottom of the login panel.

Let me know if you have any questions.
i forgot my lol pbe account username and password  , riot please help !!!!!!!!!!!!!!1
